website_summaries.verdict: An excellent styling formula and one of Wen's most popular products that earns praise for making hair manageable. A little goes a long way for most users.
pros: Smooths, controls, and protects thanks to the creamy, lightweight formula
Ideal for protecting hair prior to styling with heat
cons: Some users report some hair falling out, but many more customers rave about it

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS !!
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff ever. My hair is so manageable and shiny. Very healthy since I've been using it. I've used WEN products before and they all are the best. I have short styled hair, but I needed this to keep it from looking dry and keeps it from sticking out. Really do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: I really like using WEN products
customer_reviews.text: I really like using WEN products. I use the shampoo, the anti-frizz product and another that is spray in moisturizing product that stays in and then one styles with it left in the hair. I think a person has to get used to the shampoo not sudzing, but if you color your hair at all this product keeps the color in sooo much longer, as sudzing shampoo's strip the color out of the hair so much quicker. I love it. And this anti-frizz product keeps my hair calm and soft. I have naturally curly hair and as it gets long it can frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bowersox

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye to frizz and hello to soft hair
customer_reviews.text: This product works well to tone down the split ends and makes my hair soft. I purchased WEN because of its positive reputation and its products are not tested on animals.

customer_reviews.title: Frizz Be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect hair item for my thin, curly short hair. Anytime I have a frizz issue I just use the smallest dab to get the frizzies under control. My hair feels healthy, looks shiny and can be transformed in just a matter of minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me and I like it alot!
customer_reviews.text: This is 1 of 2 stylers of Wen products that I use, been using for years since released, either this or original cucumber aloe.... tried the cleanser but dont buy as it would break the bank for me. I'm native and have fine medium length typically layered hair that has to be washed daily. I use this from mid length to ends to tame fly and friz. I found using near scalp causes too quick oil build-up. It cuts dry time in half if air dried or blow out. And makes my dark brown mop look shiny and healthy whether I style with my natural waves or straight polished do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jenesse

product_meta.title: WEN by Chaz Dean Wen Pomegranate Anti-Frizz Styling Creme, 4 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: The Wen Anti-Frizz Styling Creme is a multifunctional styling product formulated to tame unruly strands while giving hair moisture, body and shine. It’s a light-weight all-in-one formula that helps make your hair more manageable and protect it from heat styling.
